items.question: What AI does Trend Copilot use?
items.answer: Trend Copilot is powered by GPT-4 and GPT-4o, with custom fine-tuning, prompt optimization and user preferences layered on top. It’s not just text generation — it’s strategic content built for you.

items.question: Is my data protected?
items.answer: Yes. Your data is never sold or used to train AI. We fully comply with GDPR regulations.

items.question: Which social media platforms are supported?
items.answer: Trend Copilot already generates posts adapted for LinkedIn, Instagram and X (Twitter). Currently, only LinkedIn is connected. Instagram and X require manual publishing.

items.question: When will I get access?
items.answer: Private access will open starting June 2025. Join the waitlist to be notified.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Two plans are available: Starter (€19/month) and Pro (€39/month). The Visibility MAX option is also available on request.

items.question: Will there be customer support?
items.answer: Yes. You’ll get support via email at support@trendcopilot.ai, from inside your dashboard, and a help center will be available.

items.question: Is the tool multilingual?
items.answer: Yes. Trend Copilot is available in French and English. Content is optimized for both languages.
